CleanTM ♻️

Let’s clean Timișoara — together.

Join a city-wide movement to report trash, accept cleanup quests, earn points and unlock eco rewards. Every photo, every bag of trash, every quest completed keeps Timișoara greener.

Live quest mapDiscover hotspots of litter and join nearby cleanup missions in seconds.
Points & rewardsEarn points for verified cleanups and exchange them for eco-friendly rewards.
Team up with friendsTurn city cleanups into friendly challenges and climb the leaderboard together.
Scroll to explore
3 simple steps

How It Works ♻︎

Turn helping Timișoara into a simple, rewarding habit. Join cleaning quests, upload proof, earn points and climb the leaderboard.

Step 1

Join a quest

Log in, explore the quests map and sign up for one or more cleanup missions around Timișoara.

Step 2

Clean & upload proof

Go to the spot, collect trash, and take clear before & after photos. Upload them in your quest page.

Step 3

Earn points & climb

Once approved, your quest rewards you points for the leaderboard and eco rewards in the shop.

CleanTM

Together to make a change!

We are building a greener future through community-driven action. Track progress, earn rewards, and contribute to a cleaner world.
